name: Dicey Boxing
description:
Dicey Boxing is a silly fighting game, where you can play alone or with friends in a couch coop experience. Fight other dice in a campaign using different gadgets like a boxing glove, water gun, and a jet pack!

Controls:

WASD = Single Player Movement

WASD & ARROW KEYS = Co-op Movement 

NOTE: CLICKING THE DICE AND THE GADGET WILL CYCLE IT TO THE NEXT AVAILABLE ONE (You need to unlock the gadgets in the campaign)

Team:

Music by: Adam Morton and Braincanibala

Art by: Xilurus

Sound design by: Mason Victoria

Coding by: Erizux
